The rooms feature a working area and cable TV.

Guests are welcome to eat out in the cafés and restaurants nearby.

Description:
Turist Hotel is located on Berezina River bank, and offers various treatments. It features a spa-center, gym and billiards lounge. Bobruysk town centre is within a 10-minute walk.

The hotels restaurant offers Belorussian and European dishes. A buffet breakfast is served every morning.

All bright rooms come with a TV and fridge. Guests can use a private bathroom, and free toiletries are provided.

Turist Hotel offers a sauna, massage services and mud treatment. It is possible to play bowling or billiards, and to sing karaoke. For the youngest guests there is an on-site childrens playground.

Bobruysk Central Station is 5 km from the hotel, and the distance to Minsk is 145 km. A shuttle service is provided at surcharge.

Description:

The rooms feature a fridge and cable TV. Some rooms come with a balcony and seating area.

Guests can dine in the hotels restaurant or use on-site barbecue facilities. There is also a bar on site. An array of activities can be enjoyed on site include table tennis, billiards, cycling, fishing and hiking.

Babruysk Train Station is 15.5 km away, and Minsk National Airport is 132 km from Cherry Orhard Hotel.

Description:
HeadLine : In Baranavichy

Location : Villa Sarra is located in Baranavichy.

Rooms : Make yourself at home in one of the 17 air-conditioned rooms featuring flat-screen televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms feature showers, complimentary toiletries, and hair dryers. Conveniences include irons/ironing boards and blackout drapes/curtains, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining : Take advantage of the hotel s 24-hour room service. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are available daily from 7:00 AM to 11:00 AM for a fee.

CheckIn Instructions :

  • Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges

  • This property accepts credit cards, debit cards, and cash

Description:
Featuring an indoor swimming pool, tennis court and a sauna, this hotel is located near Dzerzhinsk town, 30 km from Minsk. It also offers bowling facilities and air-conditioned rooms.

Each modern, elegant room at Hotel Westa comes complete with a flat-screen TV and a fridge. Bathrooms include a hairdryer.

The Westas restaurant with marble floors serves European cuisine, while Belorussian specialities are offered in the hotels café.  Drinks are available at the on-site bar.

The spa centre at Westa provides beauty and relaxation treatments, including a solarium, a massage and a steam bath. Billiards and table tennis can also be found on site.

The E30 motorway is 1 minutes drive from Hotel Westa, offering access to Minsk. A shuttle service to Minsks Train Station (40 km) and Airport (67 km) is available on request. Please inform Hotel Westa in advance of your expected arrival time. Description:
Located right in the historic centre of Grodno town, 200 metres from the 17th-century Cathedral of St. Francis Xavier, this hotel features free Wi-Fi. It offers a beer restaurant and a sauna.

Each room at Neman Hotel includes bright classic-style interior and a flat-screen TV. Bathrooms are fitted with a shower.

The bright and spacious Nemans restaurant features classical-décor and serves national and European cuisine.

Guests can relax in the sauna, and Grodno Drama Theatre is 3 minutes walk away.

Grodnos central square is 2 minutes walk from Neman Hotel, while the Old and New Castles are 5 minutes walk away. The M6 motorway is 5 minutes drive from the hotel, providing access to Minsk city.
